Dialogue: So, this is it, you made it. All the way to the end.
Think about your decision? Told ya there was a choice if ya ever bothered listenin.
So, what is it? You gonna join the eye? Become the big bad god you always wanted to be? Or, will you risk it all?
No pain. No suffering. No love. No happiness. Is it worth it? To throw everything away? No. Betray the eye. Fight for humanity!
I know what you saw today. Not pretty. But deep down, in each of us, lies the strength to carry on. To get through the day.
Do not give up. If you believe we deserve just one more day, then join us. You will become God. Our God.
Monad. I will make sure they know the name.
